text: Zisas khaŋ wo farasegi 12 thɨgi ŋaara gumgi ga nzuai, “Gu nde sarigim, nde nan ŋaarar muun zav vov, nde ŋkɨɨa ki daa ndira ndigap, bigi ndia vhui thari ndigap, ŋkari shari ndigap, wari vegi fhuvara. Nde mba tugen vov nde bigɨna the sosuagire?” Ana maaŋ mbe nzuaim, mbe khaŋ ana nzuai, “Nza bigɨn the sosuagi fhu.”
